nodes.text: Lantern birds were a species of bird native to the moon of Endor. They were hunted by the aggressive, sentient Dulok species, who were also native to the moon.

Lantern birds first appeared in The Adventures of Teebo: A Tale of Magic and Suspense, a Star Wars Legends novel written by Joe Johnston and released in 1984. They were confirmed to be canon in the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
